Method.name: %OnNew
Method.Implementation:
#if 1 set ..Author = initvalue.Author set ..Name = initvalue.Name set ..Path = initvalue.Path set ..Version = initvalue.Version set ..License = initvalue.License set ..Description = initvalue.Description
set cloned = $$$OK set ..Dependencies = initvalue.Dependencies.%ConstructClone(1,.cloned) set ..Keywords = initvalue.Keywords.%ConstructClone(1,.cloned) set ..Maintainers = initvalue.Maintainers.%ConstructClone(1,.cloned) set ..Items = initvalue.Items.%ConstructClone(1,.cloned) quit cloned #else quit $$$OK #endif

Method.name: Load
%DispatchSetProperty
Method.Description: is used to set the value of an unknown property.

Method.name: %DispatchGetProperty
Method.Description: Is used to get the value of an unknown property.

Query.name: Search
Query.SqlQuery: SELECT id from ( SELECT id FROM package where name = :Value union all SELECT id FROM package where name like STRING('%',:Value,'%') union all SELECT id FROM package where keywords like STRING('%',:Value,'%') union all SELECT id FROM package where description like STRING('%',:Value,'%') ) GROUP BY id

Query.name: ListByName
Query.SqlQuery: SELECT id FROM package where name like STRING('%',:Value,'%')

Query.name: ListByKeyword
Query.SqlQuery: SELECT id FROM package where keywords like STRING('%',:Value,'%')

Query.name: ListByDescription
Query.SqlQuery: SELECT id FROM package where description like STRING('%',:Value,'%')
